attributes.action: build more council houses and abolish council houses sales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: united kingdom needs more housing for rent so we are asking the prime minister to instruct councils to build more public housing and abolish council house sales

rejection.details: Thank you but your petition is very similar to an existing petition http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MoreCouncilHomes/ If you still wish to open this petition please re-submit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
